projects.title: Space Cluster - Merge & Drop
projects.description: A strategic space-themed mobile game where players merge planets and create stars to build their own galaxy. As a galactic architect, players combine smaller celestial bodies into more powerful ones, unlocking new cosmic wonders. The game features challenging gameplay mechanics with balanced spawn rates, requiring strategic thinking to progress. Built with Unity, it offers an engaging experience with vibrant visuals and mesmerizing effects, making it both easy to play yet challenging to master.

projects.title: RTMotionCapture-Animation
projects.description: A real-time motion capture system that revolutionizes 3D animation by using computer vision instead of expensive motion capture suits. The system captures human movement through a simple camera, processes it using pose estimation technology to detect key body points, and generates 3D animations in real-time. Built with a client-server architecture, it uses Python for pose estimation and Unity for 3D rendering, communicating through JSON for seamless data transfer. This innovative solution makes professional-quality motion capture accessible without the need for specialized equipment or motion tracking suits.

projects.title: G_Engine-Opengl
projects.description: A learning project focused on understanding the fundamentals of graphics programming and game engine architecture using OpenGL. This engine implements core 3D graphics concepts including vertex and index buffers, normal mapping, camera systems with both perspective and orthographic projections, and basic rendering pipeline. Built as a hands-on exploration of computer graphics principles, this project serves as a practical reference for understanding how modern game engines handle 3D rendering at a lower level.

projects.title: SRGANProgram
projects.description: A college project implementing Super-Resolution using Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to enhance image quality. The system takes low-resolution images as input and generates high-resolution versions while preserving and enhancing details. The project involved training a custom GAN model with a generator network that creates high-quality images and a discriminator network that helps improve the realism of the generated images. This implementation demonstrates practical applications of deep learning in image processing and enhancement.

workInProgress.title: Voice-Controlled Action System (Prototype for Interactive NPC Dialogue)
workInProgress.description: Developing a real-time voice-to-action framework where spoken player commands are transcribed, mapped to structured actions, and executed on a character within the game world. The current implementation supports core navigation commands to move the character in 4 differnt directions, enabling natural language voice control of in-game entities. The pipeline integrates speech-to-text transcription with an intent recognition agent that classifies commands into actionable game events. This project serves as the foundation for a broader research direction: extending the system into a fully interactive NPC dialogue model where players can use unconstrained language to ask questions, request directions, or engage in narrative-driven conversations with non-player characters. By combining speech processing, real-time action mapping, and dialogue management, this work-in-progress bridges the gap between traditional command-based input and context-aware, AI-driven game interaction.

about.summary: A passionate software engineer with expertise in game development, computer vision, and AI technologies. Currently working as a Senior Software Engineer at Earth9 Inc., where I contribute to various projects using Unity and Unreal Engine. I have a strong interest in computer vision and motion capture technologies, having developed a real-time motion capture system. I also work extensively with AI models and tools like ComfyUI for setting up and customizing various models including WAN, LoRAs, and SDXL.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Led development of multiple advanced systems and tools across Unity, Unreal Engine, and Blender.

projects.name: Procedural World Generation System (Unity)
achievements: Developed a sophisticated system that generates detailed 3D terrain and building layouts from real-world coordinates
Integrated OpenStreetMap data for accurate building placement and urban planning
Engineered a custom 2D-to-3D building construction pipeline with dynamic architectural features
Implemented complex systems for wall generation, window/door placement, and material management

projects.name: Interactive Level Editor (Unreal Engine)

Created a dynamic data processing pipeline for real-time level generation in Unreal Engine

Integrated motion capture and lip-sync systems for character animation
